name: Fairy Village
description:
"Thank you for your interest in the Fairy Simulator of the decade, with technology to rival even that of the latest consoles! Gamelad has nothing on us!"

A teeny-tiny village simulator with a lot of heart!

Your objective is simple - build up a bustling colony of fairies, keep them well-fed and keep them happy!

Gather food, go on adventures, expand, and become the bestest fairy village there ever was!

But beware, mother nature is a fickle Goddess! The weather may or may not sway in your favour...

Made with Godot 3.2.2 for the Godot Wild Jam #23.

Disclaimer: All assets have been acquired from OpenGameArt, with several edits having been done by my lovely partner, Melaniipon.
(Credits to the aforementioned assets can be found in the supplied .txt file)
